Reviews.Content: Good hotel I stayed in this hotel with a group of friends. We all thought the hotel was very good. We enjoyed the breakfast, which was of a high standard. All of us also enjoyed our stay and would return to the hotel when next in Frankfurt. The hotel is outside Frankfurt, however easy to get to via train our taxi (approx. cost of taxi 18 euro from train station). The hotel is very clean, next to the river. One may walk into Frankfurt along the river, distance approx 1.5 KM , which is a pleasant walk. Enjoy
Reviews.Author: MichaeFl

Reviews.Content: very decent place Room are large, clean. Nothing to complain about.Terrace on the first floor is great for a BBQ when the weather is good.Service varies from very friendly (terrasse) to not friendly at all (breakfast)Breakfast is great.
Reviews.Author: amlt

Reviews.Content: Sleep deprivation The Golden Tulip hotel is about 30 minutes from Frankfurt in the old leather manufacturing east side of Frankfurt.Do not sleep on the lower floors of the hotel, otherwise you will lie awake all night listening to bands practice in the record company opposite before being woken by the daily rubbish colection at 4.30am.Otherwise its great!
Reviews.Author: Traverr

Reviews.Content: Interesting Tulip Interesting clean, friendly and efficient business hotel right in the heart of the commercial area - not much use for a holiday but very convenient of you are visiting of the large companies who operate in the area.Some rooms have a nice view of the river and the rooms, whilst being basic, are large, clean and well equipped.The internet facilities leave something to be desired - connectivity is not good.The hotel also appears to be the home of the Frankfurt American Football team and here are always a lot of very large men around - took me a while to figure out why so many big guys were running about the place.Ther is a small restaurant on the ground floor where the food is an awfuly lot better than you would expect - try it!!
Reviews.Author: CTCTraveller

Reviews.Content: Lovely Hotel When we arrived staff were very friendly and helpful in directing us to the right places. Breakfast was amazing, good for the morning after! Hotel has wonderful views if you are on the right side! Pool and sauna are also a nice relaxing. As this hotel is not in central frankfurt cab ride is chaep and train station is not far. (10-12 mins walk). The only thing that the Hotel could have done better is had AC in its rooms, as we were there in the summer it was extremely hot! Otherwise a wonderful hotel. 8/10!
Reviews.Author: natural_mystic82

Reviews.Content: For the Business Traveler Some of the staff at Golden Tulip are exceptionally friendly and very helpful. The rooms are average size and have a balcony view. Cleanliness is also average. The breakfast is a great deal. Rooms are not handicapp accessible, as with the elevator buttons. This hotel is ideal for business travelers, with basic expectations.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member

Reviews.Content: Reasonable hotel, somewhat far from transport I have just completed a 2 week business stay at the hotel and,due to the length of my stay, they upgraded me to a 'deluxe' room. This was a spacious room, which was a bit on the basic / clinical side as far as furnishings were concerned. Front desk service was outstanding, with the in-house restaurant staff being rated as good to very good. The food at the restaurant was average, with the 'Argentinian filet' steak being good and the buffet generally having great selection but to be avoided due to the poor taste of the various items (this assessment was confirmed by a colleague).On the downside the rooms do not have touchtone phones available so it is not possible to make calling card calls. The laundry charges are outrageous at 2 Euro per pair of socks, 4 Euros a shirt, and upwards from there! The hotel is also pretty far from the underground (10 minutes walk, which can be miserable in winter) and there are no decent restaurants within walking distance. The sauna, pool and healthclub were all closed for the full duration that I was there.On the plus side it is located right on the banks of the Main river and there are beautiful walks all the way into Frankfurt (3 miles away) along the river bank. There is also an interesting barge lock about 100m away from the hotel that is fascinating to watch.All in all a reaosnable quality hotel at a reasonable price but a bit far away from everything.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
